title: fix: app crash on status-go signal mailserver disconnected signal
body:
It seems that *occassionally* the app will crash when disconnecting from mailservers, likely due to incorrect (or no) json that nim can't parse, causing a fatal error. I was able to see this error appear when disconnecting from the network (ie turning off wifi). Here's the stack trace:
